name: Bommarillu
summary: A young man struggles to find his independence while dealing with an overbearing father. When he meets a spirited woman, she helps him rediscover himself and follow his dreams.

name: Murari
summary: A young man from a cursed royal family must confront his fate and break a deadly generational curse to protect his loved ones and marry the woman he loves.

name: Nuvvu Naaku Nachav
summary: A cheerful young man moves into his friend’s house and bonds with the family, only to unexpectedly fall in love with the daughter — who is already engaged to someone else.

name: Varsham
summary: A love story between a passionate young man and a vibrant girl is disrupted by a powerful villain who also desires her. Their love is tested by fate and threats.

name: Kaleja
summary: A carefree cab driver turns into an unlikely savior for a drought-hit village after discovering his destiny to fight against corporate greed and corruption.

name: Fidaa
summary: A US-based NRI falls in love with a strong, independent girl from a small Indian village. Their cultural differences test their relationship as they try to find common ground.

name: Ye Maaya Chesave
summary: An aspiring filmmaker falls deeply in love with a conservative Christian girl. Their love faces challenges due to religious and emotional conflicts.

name: Brindavanam
summary: To help his girlfriend, a rich city guy pretends to be her lover in a troubled village family. Things take a twist when he ends up solving age-old feuds and capturing hearts.

name: Arya 2
summary: A mentally unstable, obsessive lover creates chaos in the life of his childhood friend and her love interest, all while claiming to act out of selfless love.

name: Gamyam
summary: An arrogant rich man goes on a journey to find his lost love and ends up discovering life, humanity, and friendship through an unexpected bond with a carefree biker.

name: Indra
summary: A powerful village leader sacrifices his life and happiness for the welfare of his people and seeks justice for his family.

name: Tagore
summary: A professor forms a vigilante group to fight corruption in the society and government systems.

name: Arya
summary: A free-spirited guy falls in love with a girl who is already in a relationship, and he sets out to win her heart by staying true to himself.

name: Athadu
summary: A professional assassin is forced to take the identity of a dead man to escape from the law, leading to a journey of emotional discovery.

name: Pokiri
summary: A ruthless undercover cop infiltrates the underworld and eliminates gangsters from within, while hiding his real identity.

name: Desamuduru
summary: A TV journalist ends up in a remote Himalayan village where he falls for a mysterious woman with a troubled past.

name: Jalsa
summary: A rebellious college student with a mysterious past fights for justice while dealing with romantic twists.

name: Arundhati
summary: A woman discovers her past life and battles an evil sorcerer to save her family and fulfill her destiny.

name: Magadheera
summary: A brave warrior reincarnates to reclaim his lost love and defeat the evil prince who betrayed him in a past life.
